text:
City Police Commissioner Sumit Sharan presenting the appointment order to transgender K. Prithika Yashini in Salem on Monday. — Photo: E. Lakshmi Narayanan

K. Prithika Yashini (25), a transgender whose application was initially rejected by the Tamil Nadu Uniformed Services Recruitment Board over her gender choice, received the appointment order as Sub-Inspector of police in Salem on Monday. Page 6
title: Transgender SI receives appointment order
